titleInfo.title: 'A History of Persia from the beginning of the ninteenth century to the year 1859 with a review of the principal events that led to the establishment of the Kajar Dynasty'

physicalDescription.extent: This volume contains a table of contents giving chapter headings and page references. Rach chapter heading is followed by a detailed breakdown of the contents of the chapter.

mods.abstract: A History of Persia from the beginning of the ninteenth century to the year 1859 with a review of the principal events that led to the establishment of the Kajar Dynastyby Robert Grant Wilson.Publication Details: London: Smith, Elder and Co., 65, Cornhill.Physical Description: initial Roman numeral pagination (i-xii); 8ยบ.
